I have noticed that my best fitness sometimes declines.

While I can sort o=
f understand this if I have enabled 'pruning', it
also occurs even when I d=
isable pruning.

I suspected that in long runs, my most fit individual was =
stagnant and
stopped improving its fitness and therefore was being killed w=
hen
'Species Dropoff Age' was exceeded. To counteract this, I set the
Speci=
es Dropoff age to an absurdly large number to effectively disable
it but th=
e most fit individual still was eventually killed and my best
fitness decli=
ned.

Since I have the very nice feature 'Save Genome On Improvement'
enabl=
ed I guess I don't mind terribly since clearing out species which
have stop=
ped improving makes way for other explorations.

Have other people noticed =
this? Do you consider a bug or a feature?
How could I avoid this if I chose=
 to?

Thanks,

Peter
